name: Hyperloglog
tagline: Hyperloglog cardinality estimation algorithm implementation in Java 8
body:
### Hyperloglog
This is a Java implementation of the [HyperLogLog algorithm](http://algo.inria.fr/flajolet/Publications/FlFuGaMe07.pdf). The implementation is based on using `byte` sized registers instead of the 5 bit mentioned in the algorithm. This makes the implementation overall pretty simple and easy to understand.

### Pull Requests
Pull requests are welcome.

### Authors and Contributors
Author: @joychugh
